a:r.a:t: 1. Pretraining documents are conditioned on latent concepts (e.g. Addition, Subtraction)
There was were 4 pizzas that needed to be shared between 8 people, so I gave each person
2. Sample examples conditioned on previous examples and the inferred concept
If I had 4 apples and two people an equal amount each, how much does each person have?
If I had 4 apples and gave each person equal amount, how much does each person have?
So four divided by two is two.
Well, I remember 4 pizzas divided by 8 people is 1/2
Like the pizzas, I remember splitting the bill
3. Chain of thought helps infer the right concept
Ah yes! We are talking about division.
